to_address: "Speakup is a screen review system for Linux." <Speakup@braille.uwo.ca>
subject: fedora live and speech
body:
Can the live CD of Fedora be run with speech before installation?
I downloaded the Live CD as I don't have a DVD drive on my laptop.
If speech can be run from the Live F7 CD how is it done?
